## directoryPath() function

Given a path to an existing file or directory, makes sure that the path points to a directory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function directoryPath(path: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | Path to a file or directory |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

## Remarks

One of the usage of this function is to allow people reference a file in a property supposed to point to a directory. In that case, the function will return the path to the file parent directory.
